item.title: Why banks are afraid you’re going to ditch them for stablecoins
item.description: Regulated U.S.-dollar stablecoins could become as ordinary as money-market funds.

item.title: BlackRock turns ‘neutral’ on long-term Treasurys ahead of potential Fed rate cuts
item.description: BlackRock shifted its tactical view of long-term Treasurys but said the macroeconomic backdrop is “murky.”
